revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SkyLink |model=SL-R7205 |revision=(XDX-RN502J) V2.0 |est_release_date=05/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=widemac |manuf_model=SL-R7205 |manuf_rev=V2.0 |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320EBTI-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-6G |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J2,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21; |tp_firmware=Wive-NG |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:13:13 |oui_eth=00:13:13 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N300 AP/Router}}
"XDX-RN502J V2.0" and "1022" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|widemac SL-R720x (XDX-RN502J)}} Shares the same board ID as the [[DealExtreme 92141]] :aka ''Bococom TH-R300W'', ''Aceex NR22''
This is similar to text on the [[Winstars WS-WR511N1]] and they :likely share the same manufacturer (if not Winstars).
The manufacturer of this device appears to be '''widemac''' : :[http://sztianhao.com Shenzhen Century Xinyang Technology Co., Ltd].
===Wiki's=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/unbranded/xdx-rn502j On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/widemac/sl-r7205 "Widemac SL-R720X"]) *[https://wiki.reseaulibre.ca/hardware/routers/ On the '''Reseau Libre''' wiki] :[[SkyLink SL-R7205 (XDX-RN502J)]] (Widemac) :[[SkyLink SL-R7206 (XDX-RN502R)]] (Widemac) - [https://wiki.reseaulibre.ca/hardware/routers/Bococom-DWR150/ Bococom DW-R150]
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=158105 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=82160 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (images) :[https://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=61162 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums]
